testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici "jPHBaseUrl" base URL'ini kullanir..........................passed Then Path parametreleri icin "posts/44" kullanir............................passed And jPH server a GET request gonderir ve testleri yapmak icin response degerini kaydeder.passed Then jPH respons'da status degerinin 200....................................passed And jPH respons'da content type degerinin "application/json; charset=utf-8".passed Then jPH GET respons body'sinde "userId" degerinin Integer 5................passed And jPH GET respons body'sinde "title" degerinin String "optio dolor molestias sit".passed

Given Kullanici "jPHBaseUrl" base URL'ini kullanir..........................passed Then Path parametreleri icin "posts/70" kullanir............................passed And POST request icin "Ahmet","Merhaba",10 70 bilgileri ile request body olusturur.passed And jPH server a POST request gonderir ve testleri yapmak icin response degerini kaydeder.passed Then jPH respons'da status degerinin 200....................................passed And jPH respons'da content type degerinin "application/json; charset=utf-8".passed And jPH respons daki "Connection" header degerinin "keep-alive".............passed Then response attribute degerlerinin "Ahmet","Merhaba",10 70................passed
